messages.message: How do I know what verion of Aihub I’m using ? (context: I’m Aihub ST)
Run this in the browser console: `window.context.launcher.about_info`
Can we expose this in the drop down for a user @Xindi Xu?
Sure we can. Do we want something like this?

Hm my concern with that@Orlando is that footer doesn't appear on all pages and it's not very discoverable (I actually didn't even know it existed until now!). I'd prefer to have a permanent more discoverable location.

Lee requested this feature awhile ago, if we’d like to follow up with or link that ticket on any work--just so we can close it out from the EPD board :) https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-669.
Yea, I'd prefer to show it in a modal as well. Do we want to show it to external users or should it be internal only?

I don’t think it hurts to have both: Learning from my last company - you might have a scenario where we’re trying to help a customer that can’t log in. And the issue could be do to with their version.
